name: ToastRoot
description:
Groups all parts of an individual toast.
Renders a `<div>` element.

swipeDirection.description: Direction(s) in which the toast can be swiped to dismiss.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-expanded.description: Present when the toast is expanded in the viewport.

data-limited.description: Present when the toast was removed due to exceeding the limit.

data-swipe-direction.description: The direction the toast was swiped.

data-swiping.description: Present when the toast is being swiped.

data-starting-style.description: Present when the toast is animating in.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the toast is animating out.

--toast-index.description: Indicates the index of the toast in the list.

--toast-offset-y.description: Indicates the vertical pixels offset of the toast in the list when expanded.

--toast-swipe-movement-x.description: Indicates the horizontal swipe movement of the toast.

--toast-swipe-movement-y.description: Indicates the vertical swipe movement of the toast.
